text: (melum, manitarkalai nokkik kurumpati iprahimukku kattalaiyittom.) Kuruviraka! Pumiyil ninkal currit tirintu parunkal. Arampattil pataippukalai evvaru urpatti ceykiran. (Avvare maranitta) pinnarum allah (marumaiyil) marumuraiyum urpatti ceyvan. Niccayamaka allah anaittin mitum mikka arralullavan
